<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.6
<SEQUENCE>7
<FILENAME>a06-14795_1ex10d6.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.6
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>






</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit
10.6</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">TIME
SHARING AGREEMENT</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Time Sharing
Agreement (&#147;Agreement&#148;) is dated as of _______________, 2006 by and between
Abbott Laboratories Inc. (&#147;Company&#148;), and ____________________ (&#147;Executive&#148;).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">RECITALS</font></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS,</font></b>
Company owns or rightfully possesses and operates the aircraft set forth in Exhibit&nbsp;A
attached hereto (individually and collectively, as the context requires, the &#147;Aircraft&#148;);
and</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS,</font></b>
Company employs a fully qualified flight crew to operate the Aircraft; and</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS,</font></b>
Executive is __________________ of Abbott Laboratories, an Illinois Corporation
(&#147;Abbott&#148;) and the parent corporation of Company; and</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS,</font></b>
in order to protect the safety and security of Executive and maximize his/her
availability to carry out his/her responsibilities, Abbott&#146;s Board of Directors
has adopted a policy that generally requires Executive to travel on the
Aircraft for all his/her air travel, whether on Abbott business or personal
travel; and</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><br>
<b>WHEREAS,</b> Executive desires to lease one
or more of the Aircraft from time to time on a time sharing basis as defined in
Sections&nbsp;91.501(b)(6)&nbsp;and (c)(1)&nbsp;of the Federal Aviation
Regulations (&#147;FARs&#148;) when he/she is required under the Board&#146;s policy to fly on
the Aircraft for personal travel.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NOW,
THEREFORE,</font></b> in consideration of the foregoing, and the other
promises contained herein, the parties, intending to be legally bound hereby,
agree as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1. Company agrees
to lease the Aircraft to Executive on a non-exclusive basis from time to time
as mutually agreed between the parties pursuant to the provisions of FAR
91.501(b)(6)&nbsp;and (c)(1)&nbsp;and to provide a fully qualified flight crew
for all operations conducted under this Agreement. This Agreement shall remain
in effect until terminated by either party upon ten (10)&nbsp;days prior
written notice to the other.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2. (a)&nbsp;Except
as further limited by subparagraph 2(b)&nbsp;of this Agreement, Executive shall
pay to Company for each flight conducted under this Agreement a lease fee (&#147;Lease
Fee&#148;) equal to the actual expenses of each specific flight as authorized by FAR
Part&nbsp;91.501(d)&nbsp;except as such amount may be further limited by
subparagraph 2(b)&nbsp;below. Such actual expenses shall include:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&nbsp;Fuel,
oil, lubricants, and other additives;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&nbsp;Travel
expenses of the crew, including food, lodging and ground transportation;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)&nbsp;Hangar
and tie-down costs away from the Aircraft&#146;s base of operation;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)&nbsp;Insurance
obtained for the specific flight;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v)&nbsp;Landing
fees, airport taxes and similar assessments;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vi)&nbsp;Customs,
foreign permits, and similar fees directly related to the flight;</font></p>

<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\fc\219173836_D11189_1283920\14795-1-kc.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Aug  7 17:03 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vii)&nbsp;In-flight food and beverages;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(viii)&nbsp;Passenger
ground transportation; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ix)&nbsp;Flight
planning and weather contract services.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&nbsp;Notwithstanding
the amount of the actual expenses set forth in subparagraph 2(a)&nbsp;of this
Agreement, in no event shall Executive be obligated to pay Company a Lease Fee
in excess of the greater of (x)&nbsp;or (y)&nbsp;below, where:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(x)&nbsp;equals
the applicable subsection (i)&nbsp;or (ii)&nbsp;below:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&nbsp;For travel between cities served by regularly
scheduled first class commercial airline service, an amount equal to the lowest
published cost of the first class airfare available to the general public,
which will be solicited within one business day of the date the Executive
requests the specific flight, for the dates traveled multiplied by the number
of persons in Executive&#146;s party for the flight; or</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&nbsp;For travel between cities served by
regularly scheduled coach or business class, but not first class commercial
airline service, an amount equal to the lowest published cost of the
unrestricted coach (or, if available, business class) airfare available to the
general public, which will be solicited within one business day of the date the
Executive requests the specific flight, for the dates traveled multiplied by
the number of persons in Executive&#146;s party for the flight; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(y)&nbsp;equals
the amount of income that would be imputed to Executive for the flight under
the applicable Standard Industry Fare Levels as set forth in 26 C.F.R. &#167;1.61-21(g)&nbsp;assuming
that Executive did not pay the Lease Fee.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For purposes of
the foregoing computation, if a city is not served by regularly scheduled
commercial airline service, the foregoing provisions shall be applied utilizing
a city selected by Company as close as reasonably practicable to the city
without such service. Company&#146;s determination of the Lease Fee shall be
conclusive. Prior to any proposed flight, Company shall provide Executive with
an estimate of the Lease Fee for the particular flight. If Executive proceeds
with the proposed flight, he/she shall be obligated to pay the Lease Fee.
Executive shall also be responsible to pay, together with any Lease Fee,
applicable state and federal taxes (including, without limitation, federal
excise taxes). If Executive declines the proposed flight, neither Executive nor
Company shall have any further obligation with respect to the proposed flight.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3. Company will
pay all expenses related to the operation of the Aircraft when incurred, and
will provide an invoice to Executive for the Lease Fee determined in accordance
with paragraph 2 above after any flight or flights for the account of
Executive. Executive shall pay Company the Lease Fee, together with applicable
taxes.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4. Executive will
provide Company with requests for flight time and proposed flight schedules as
far in advance of any given flight as possible, and in any case, at least two (2)&nbsp;business
days in advance of Executive&#146;s planned departure (unless Company agrees to a
shorter notice in a particular case in its discretion). Requests for flight
time shall be in a form, whether written or oral, mutually </font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">2</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\fc\219173836_D11189_1283920\14795-1-kc.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Aug  7 17:03 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">convenient to, and
agreed upon by the parties. In addition to the proposed schedules and flight
times, Executive shall provide at least the following information for each proposed
flight prior to scheduled departure as required by the Company or Company&#146;s
flight crew:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&nbsp;proposed
departure point;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&nbsp;destination;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&nbsp;date
and time of flight;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&nbsp;the
number, name, and relationship to the Executive of anticipated passengers;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)&nbsp;the
nature and extent of luggage and/or cargo to be carried;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)&nbsp;the
date and time of return flight, if any; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)&nbsp;any
other information concerning the proposed flight that may be pertinent or
required by Company or Company&#146;s flight crew.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5. Company shall
have final authority over the scheduling of the Aircraft, provided, however,
that Company will use reasonable efforts to accommodate Executive&#146;s requests
and to avoid conflicts in scheduling. It is understood that Company shall not
be obligated to retain or contract for additional flight crew or maintenance
personnel or equipment in order to accommodate Executive&#146;s schedule requests.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6. Company shall
be solely responsible for securing maintenance, preventive maintenance and
required or otherwise necessary inspections on the Aircraft, and shall take
such requirements into account in scheduling the Aircraft. No period of
maintenance, preventative maintenance or inspection shall be delayed or
postponed for the purpose of scheduling the Aircraft, unless said maintenance
or inspection can be safely conducted at a later time in compliance with all
applicable laws and regulations, and within the sound discretion of the pilot
in command. The pilot in command shall have final and complete authority to
cancel any flight for any reason or condition that in his or her judgment would
compromise the safety of the flight.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7. Company shall
ensure that for each flight conducted under this Agreement, the Aircraft will
be under the command of a qualified flight crew. All flight operations by or on
behalf of Executive under this Agreement shall be conducted under Part&nbsp;91
of the FAR. The Company shall have and exercise exclusive operational control
of the Aircraft during all phases of all flights under this Agreement,
including, without limitation, all flights during which Executive, and/or
his/her guests, designees, or property are on-board the Aircraft.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8. In accordance
with applicable FARs, the qualified flight crew provided by Company will
exercise all of its duties and responsibilities in regard to the safety of each
flight conducted hereunder. Executive specifically agrees that the flight crew,
in its sole discretion, may terminate any flight, refuse to commence any
flight, or take other action that in the considered judgment of the pilot in
command is necessitated by considerations of safety. No such action of the
pilot in command shall create or support any liability for loss, injury, damage
or delay to Executive or any other person. The parties further agree that
Company shall not be liable for delay or failure to furnish the Aircraft and
crew pursuant to this Agreement for any reason whatsoever.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">3</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\fc\219173836_D11189_1283920\14795-1-kc.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Aug  7 17:03 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9. Company will
maintain or cause to be maintained in full force and effect throughout the term
of this Agreement aircraft liability insurance in respect of the Aircraft. Such
insurance shall (i)&nbsp;name Executive as an additional insured; (ii)&nbsp;contain
a waiver of subrogation against Executive; and (iii)&nbsp;shall provide that if
the insurers cancel such insurance for any reason whatsoever, if the insurance
is not renewed due to non-payment of premium or if there is any material change
in policy terms and conditions, such cancellation, change or lapse shall not be
effective as to Executive unless Executive has been provided with at least thirty
(30) days prior written notice. Company will provide such additional insurance
coverage as Executive shall request or require, provided, however, that the
cost of such additional insurance shall be borne by Executive as set forth in
paragraph 2.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10. Executive
warrants that:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&nbsp;
He/she will use the Aircraft for and on account of his/her own business or
personal use only, and will not use the Aircraft for the purpose of providing
transportation of passengers or cargo in air commerce for compensation or hire;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&nbsp;He/she
will refrain from incurring any mechanics or other lien in connection with
inspection, preventative maintenance, maintenance or storage of the Aircraft,
whether permissible or impermissible under this Agreement, nor shall there be
any attempt by Executive to convey, mortgage, assign, lease or any way alienate
the Aircraft or create any kind of lien or security interest involving the
Aircraft or do anything or take any action that might mature into such a lien;
and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&nbsp;During
the term of this Agreement, he/she will, and will cause any passengers in
his/her party to, abide by and conform to all such laws, governmental and
airport orders, rules&nbsp;and regulations, as shall from time to time be in
effect relating in any way to the operation and use of the Aircraft by a time
sharing lessee.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11. The Company
assumes and shall bear the entire risk of loss, theft, confiscation, damage to,
or destruction of the Aircraft. The Company shall release, indemnify, defend
and hold harmless the Executive and his/her heirs, executors and personal
representatives from and against any and all losses, liabilities, claims,
judgments, damages, fines, penalties, deficiencies and expenses (including,
without limitation, reasonable attorneys fees and expenses) incurred or
suffered by Executive on account of a claim or action made or instituted by a
third person arising out of or resulting from operations of the Aircraft
hereunder and/or any services provided by the Company to Executive hereunder,
except to the extent attributable to the gross negligence or willful misconduct
of Executive or his/her guests on the Aircraft.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12. For purposes
of this Agreement, the permanent base of operation of the Aircraft shall be
Waukegan, Illinois.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13. Neither this
Agreement nor any party&#146;s interest herein shall be assignable to any other
party whatsoever. This Agreement shall inure to the benefit of and be binding
upon the parties hereto, and their respective heirs, representatives and
successors.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14. This Agreement
constitutes the entire agreement of the parties with respect to the time-share
of the Aircraft as set forth herein. This Agreement shall be governed by, and
construed in accordance with, the laws of the State of Illinois.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">4</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\fc\219173836_D11189_1283920\14795-1-kc.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Aug  7 17:03 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[REMAINDER OF PAGE
INTENTIONALLY BLANK]</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">5</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\fc\219173836_D11189_1283920\14795-1-kc.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Aug  7 17:03 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15. TRUTH IN LEASING
STATEMENT</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THE AIRCRAFT HAVE
BEEN MAINTAINED AND INSPECTED UNDER FAR PART&nbsp;91.409(f)(3)&nbsp;DURING THE
12 MONTH PERIOD (OR SUCH SHORTER PERIOD AS THE AIRCRAFT HAS BEEN OPERATED BY
COMPANY) PRECEDING THE DATE OF THIS LEASE.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THE AIRCRAFT WILL
BE MAINTAINED AND INSPECTED UNDER FAR PART&nbsp;91.409(f)(3)&nbsp;FOR
OPERATIONS TO BE CONDUCTED UNDER THIS LEASE.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ABBOTT
LABORATORIES INC., A DELAWARE CORPORATION, IS CONSIDERED RESPONSIBLE FOR
OPERATIONAL CONTROL OF ALL AIRCRAFT IDENTIFIED AND TO BE OPERATED UNDER THIS
LEASE. I, THE UNDERSIGNED, __________________, AS _____________________ OF
ABBOTT LABORATORIES INC. CERTIFY THAT ABBOTT LABORATORIES INC. IS RESPONSIBLE
FOR OPERATIONAL CONTROL OF THE AIRCRAFT FOR OPERATIONS TO BE CONDUCTED UNDER
THIS LEASE AND THAT IT UNDERSTANDS ITS RESPONSIBILITIES FOR COMPLIANCE WITH
APPLICABLE FEDERAL AVIATION REGULATIONS.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">AN EXPLANATION OF
FACTORS BEARING ON OPERATIONAL CONTROL AND PERTINENT FEDERAL AVIATION
REGULATIONS CAN BE OBTAINED FROM THE NEAREST FAA FLIGHT STANDARDS DISTRICT
OFFICE.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THE ADDRESS OF
ABBOTT LABORATORIES INC. IS:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2900 West Aviation
Drive</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Waukegan, IL 60087</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS
WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement as of the date first above
written.</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;font-family:Times New Roman;width:100.0%;">

A &#151; List of Aircraft</font></b></p>

 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 1.1pt 12.0pt 0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit 12</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 1.1pt 12.0pt 0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Abbott
Laboratories</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 1.1pt 12.0pt 0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Computation of
Ratio of Earnings to Fixed Charges</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 1.1pt 12.0pt 0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(Unaudited)</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 1.1pt 12.0pt 0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">(dollars
in millions except ratio)</font></i></p>

 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="84%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:84.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Add (deduct):</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.68%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="0%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:.82%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="84%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:84.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 20.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Taxes on
  earnings</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.68%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">315</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="0%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:.82%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

  <td width="84%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:84.12%;">

  interest cost, net of amortization</font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="0%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:.82%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="84%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:84.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Ratio of earnings to
  fixed charges</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.68%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.7</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="0%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:.82%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0pt 44.3pt 12.0pt 0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 44.3pt 12.0pt 0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOTE:&#160;&#160;&#160; For the
purpose of calculating this ratio, (i) earnings have been calculated by
adjusting earnings for taxes on earnings; interest expense; capitalized
interest cost, net of amortization; minority interest; and the portion of
rentals representative of the interest factor, (ii) Abbott considers one-third
of rental expense to be the amount representing return on capital, and (iii)
fixed charges comprise total interest expense, including capitalized interest
and such portion of rentals.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<head>






</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div>
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>

<h6 align="right" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 31.1</font></b></h6>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Certification
of Chief Executive Officer<br>
Required by Rule 13a-14(a) (17 CFR 240.13a-14(a))</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I, Miles D. White, certify that:</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">I have
reviewed this quarterly report on Form 10-Q of Abbott Laboratories;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Based on my
knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact
or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in
light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Based on my
knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included
in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and cash flows of Abbott as of, and for, the
periods presented in this report;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Abbott&#146;s
other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining
disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e)
and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in
Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for Abbott and have:</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Designed
such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and
procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material
information relating to Abbott, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is
made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the
period in which this report is being prepared;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Designed
such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control
over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide
reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the
preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with
generally accepted accounting principles;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">c)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Evaluated
the effectiveness of Abbott&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented
in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure
controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report
based on such evaluation; and</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">d)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Disclosed in
this report any change in Abbott&#146;s internal control over financial reporting
that occurred during Abbott&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter that has materially
affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, Abbott&#146;s internal
control over financial reporting; and</font></p>

<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\fc\219162321860_D11189_1283717\14795-1-kg.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Aug  7 16:23 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Abbott&#146;s
other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent
evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to Abbott&#146;s auditors
and the audit committee of Abbott&#146;s board of directors:</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">All
significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of
internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to
adversely affect Abbott&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report
financial information; and</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 24.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Any fraud,
whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a
significant role in Abbott&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;font-family:Times New Roman;width:100.0%;">

<h6 align="right" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 31.2</font></b></h6>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Certification
of Chief Financial Officer<br>
Required by Rule 13a-14(a) (17 CFR 240.13a-14(a))</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I, Thomas C. Freyman, certify that:</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">I have
reviewed this quarterly report on Form 10-Q of Abbott Laboratories;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Based on my
knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact
or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in
light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Based on my

in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and cash flows of Abbott as of, and for, the
periods presented in this report;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Abbott&#146;s
other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining
disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e)
and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in
Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for Abbott and have:</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Designed

information relating to Abbott, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is
made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the
period in which this report is being prepared;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Designed
such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control
over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide
reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the
preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally
accepted accounting principles;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">c)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Evaluated

in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure

based on such evaluation; and</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">d)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Disclosed in

that occurred during Abbott&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter that has materially
affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, Abbott&#146;s internal
control over financial reporting; and</font></p>

significant role in Abbott&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.</font></p>

<TYPE>EX-32.1

<html>

<head>






</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 216.0pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 32.1</font></b></p>

<h2 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Certification Pursuant To<br>
18 U.S.C. Section 1350<br>
As Adopted Pursuant To<br>
Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002</font></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:40.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In connection with
the Quarterly Report of Abbott Laboratories (the &#147;Company&#148;) on Form 10-Q for
the period ended June 30, 2006 as filed with the Securities and Exchange
Commission (the &#147;Report&#148;), I, Miles D. White, Chairman of the Board and Chief
Executive Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &#167; 1350, as
adopted pursuant to &#167; 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Report fully
complies with the requirements of section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The information
contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the
financial condition and results of operations of the Company.</p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="35%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:35.7%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">/s/&nbsp;Miles
  D. White</font><!-- SET mrlNoTableShading --></p>
  </td>
  <td width="64%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:64.3%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="35%" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:35.7%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Miles D. White</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="64%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:64.3%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="35%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:35.7%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Chairman of the
  Board and</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="64%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:64.3%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Chief Executive
  Officer</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="64%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:64.3%;">

  2006</font></p>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>

<h4 align="right" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 32.2</font></b></h4>

<h2 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Certification Pursuant To<br>
18 U.S.C. Section 1350<br>
As Adopted Pursuant To<br>
Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002</font></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In connection with
the Quarterly Report of Abbott Laboratories (the &#147;Company&#148;) on Form 10-Q for
the period ended June 30, 2006 as filed with the Securities and Exchange
Commission (the &#147;Report&#148;), I, Thomas C. Freyman, Executive Vice President,
Finance and Chief Financial Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to 18
U.S.C. &#167; 1350, as adopted pursuant to &#167; 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002,
that:</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Report fully
complies with the requirements of section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The information
contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the
financial condition and results of operations of the Company.</p>
